reg_pit.acttitle: Economic Incentive and Stabilization Statutes Amendment Act, 2008
reg_pit.title: Depreciation (2009 Taxation Year) Regulation

change.changenote: Note: This regulation has been placed in the Regulations Point in Time collection. This regulation is not repealed.

reg.acttitle: Economic Incentive and Stabilization Statutes Amendment Act, 2008
reg.title: Depreciation (2009 Taxation Year) Regulation

section.sectiontext: For the purpose of determining the actual value of a property under section 25 [determination of "2007 value"] of the Economic Incentive and Stabilization Statutes Amendment Act, 2008, there is no deduction in respect of any depreciation of the property for the period beginning on July 1, 2007 and ending on

paragraph.paragraphtext: October 31, 2008, if section 25 (4) of that Act applies to the property, or
December 31, 2008, if section 25 (6) of that Act applies to the property.

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Economic Incentive and Stabilization Statutes Amendment Act, 2008, S.B.C. 2008, c. 44, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 31]
